div.div:
What gets inherited from parent distros?
РюЁ Package format (.deb, .rpm) Рђћ Ubuntu inherits .deb from Debian
РюЁ Package manager (apt, dnf) Рђћ same tools across family
РюЁ Directory structure Рђћ follows FHS standard
РюЁ Init system Рђћ mostly systemd now
РЮї NOT inherited: Release schedule, default packages, repositories, branding

div.div:
All distros share the same FHS structure:
Рђб /bin, /sbin, /lib Рєњ essential system binaries
Рђб /etc Рєњ configuration files (passwd, fstab, network)
Рђб /usr Рєњ applications and libraries
Рђб /var Рєњ logs, caches, runtime data
Рђб /home Рєњ user directories
Difference: Size (Alpine: 5MB vs Ubuntu: 5GB+), default filesystem (ext4/btrfs/xfs)
